meanings.sent1: She definitizes her schedule every Sunday by planning out each day.
meanings.sent2: The teacher definitizes the homework assignments for the students to understand clearly.
meanings.sent3: The detective definitizes the suspect's alibi, revealing the truth behind the crime.
meanings.sent4: His confident tone definitizes his position as the leader of the team.
meanings.sent5: The map definitizes the route to the treasure with a bold red line.

meanings.definition: To establish or determine with certainty.
meanings.sent1: The scientist definitizes the experiment's results by conducting multiple trials.
meanings.sent2: The judge definitizes the verdict after carefully reviewing all the evidence.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller definitizes the future of her clients with her accurate predictions.
meanings.sent4: The compass definitizes the direction, guiding the lost hikers back to safety.
meanings.sent5: The survey definitizes the preferences of the customers, helping the company make informed decisions.
